## GerstnerWaveGenerator.setWaveLength() method

Sets the length of the wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setWaveLength(waveIndex: number, val: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |
|  val | number | Length of the wave. |

**Returns:**

void
